description: Main menu loads correctly on page load.
expected_result: After loading the app, the main menu should be visible. Available elements: Pick player 1's mark, new game buttons (vs cpu, vs player)

description: Mark X is selected by default on page load.
expected_result: After loading the app, player 1's mark X should be selected by default.

description: Game board is not visible on load page.
expected_result: After loading the app, the game board should not be visible. The board appears only after starting a new game.

description: Selecting player 1's mark updates the selection.
expected_result: After selecting player 1's mark O, O should be selected. After selecting player 1's mark X, X should be selected.

description: Selecting already selected player 1's mark does not change selection.
expected_result: After selecting player 1's mark O the first time, O should be selected. After selecting O again, O should remain selected.

description: Starting a new game vs CPU displays the game board.
expected_result: After clicking the 'New Game vs CPU' button, the game board should be visible. Menu should disappear.

description: Starting a new game vs Player displays the game board.
expected_result: After clicking the 'New Game vs Player' button, the game board should be visible. Menu should disappear.

description: Game stats X wins, O wins, and Ties are initialized to 0.
expected_result: After starting a new game, the game stats should show X wins: 0, Ties: 0, O wins: 0.

description: Current turn always shows X after starting a new game.
expected_result: Game board should always show current turn as X after starting a new game, regardless of player 1's selected mark.

description: All game fields are empty at the start of a new game.
expected_result: After starting a new game, all 9 fields on the game board should be empty.

description: Game stats vs CPU shows 'YOU' and 'CPU' labels.
steps: Start a new game vs CPU
Start a new game vs CPU
expected_result: After step 3, game stats have labels: X (YOU), Ties, O (CPU). After step 6, game stats show: X (CPU), Ties, O (YOU).

description: Game stats vs Player shows 'PLAYER 1' and 'PLAYER 2' labels.
steps: Start a new game vs Player
Start a new game vs Player
expected_result: `After step 3, game stats have labels: X (PLAYER 1), Ties, O (PLAYER 2). After step 6, game stats show: X (PLAYER 2), Ties, O (PLAYER 1).

description: Back to main menu button returns to the main menu.
expected_result: After clicking the 'Back to main menu' button, the main menu should be visible again.

description: Filled fields cannot be overwritten.
steps: Start a new game vs player
Click on an empty field to place a mark
Click on the same field again
expected_result: After the first click, the selected field should display the current player's mark. After the second click on the same field, the mark should remain unchanged.

description: Player 1's mark does not change after refreshing
expected_result: Player 1's mark is remembered after the app refreshing the app. After step 1 player 1's mark is X, after step 2 is O and after step 3 is X

description: App does not back to main menu after refreshing during game.
expected_result: After step 1 menu window disappears and the game board is visible. After step 2 game board is still visible and menu window is hidden

description: Player turn does not change after refreshing.
steps: Start a new game vs player
Make a move on x turn
expected_result: After x move, the current turn is O. Refreshing the app does not change the turn.

description: Filled game fields remain filled after refreshing.
steps: Make some fields filled without finishing the game
expected_result: Game fields should not lose their fullfillment. Game board should look the same before and after refreshing.

description: Game stats remain their value after refreshing.
steps: Start a new game vs player
Play some games to increase all game stats (x wins, ties and o wins) to at least 1
expected_result: Game stats remain their values

description: Restart game panel does not disappear after refreshing.
expected_result: After clicking the restart button, restart game panel appears. After refreshing the app, restart game panel is still visible.

description: Finish game panel does not disappear after refreshing.
steps: Play full game to getting the winner
expected_result: After finishing the game, finish game panel appears. After refreshing the app, the panel is still visible.
